caption.center: Don W. DAVIS, Appellant/Movant, v. ARKANSAS DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTION
and Ray Hobbs, in his Official Capacity as acting Director of the

opinion.posture: Motion for Stay of Execution, Motion Moot.
opinion.opinion_text:
On April 5, 2010, Don W. Davis received a stay of execution from the United States District Court for the Eastern District of Arkansas. See Jones v. Hobbs, No. 5:10CV00065 (E.D. Ark.) (Document #53) (April 5, 2010). Because this stay is currently in effect, Davis's motion for a stay of execution before this court is moot.
WILLS, J., not participating.
